$x_{1}$ is foggy/misty/covered by a fog/mist/vapor of liquid $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (def. 1) local weight unit(s) [non-metric], standard $x_{3}$, subunits [e.g. ounces] $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {grake}, {junta}, {tilju}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {kramu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is brown/tan [color adjective].
$s_1$ is a sister-in-law (brother's spouse) of $m_2$ under law/custom/tradition/system/convention $sp_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a brush for purpose $x_{2}$ (event) with bristles $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is embarrassed/disconcerted/flustered/ill-at-ease about/under conditions $x_{2}$ (abstraction).
$n_1$ is brown bread made from grains $n_2$.
$g_1$ (agent) embarrasses/disconcerts $b_1$ about/under conditions $b_2$ (abstraction).
letteral for b.
Berlin.
time tense relation/direction: is [selbri]; during/simultaneous with [sumti]; present tense.
sumti question asking for a time/date/event; simultaneous with what?.
modal aspect: actuality/ongoing event.
$cl_1$ is unaided by/without apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment $ca_1=cl_2$ for function $ca_2$ controlled/triggered by $ca_3$ (agent).
evidential: I define.
$b_1=c_2$ is a wind from direction $b_2$ with speed $b_3$, shoving/pushing $c_2$ at locus $c_3$.
$g_1=c_1$ pushes $m_1=c_2$ to destination $m_2$ from origin $m_3$ over path/route $m_4$.
$s_1$ is a valve/piston of material $s_2$, shoving/pushing $c_2$ at locus $c_3$.
catni modal, 1st place by authority of ...
$cp_1=ca_2$ demands $cp_2=ca_2$ from $cp_3$.
$cu_1=ca_1$ (agent) permits/lets/allows $cu_2$ (event) under conditions $cu_3$, derived from authority on basis $ca_3$.
$j_1$ is a charge of service $j_2$ to consumer $j_3=c_2$ set and levied by authority $j_4=c_1$.
$z_2$ is official, approved by authority $z_1=c_1$ over sphere/people $c_2$.
$v_1$ is an authoritative document of $v_2$ (data/facts/du'u) about $v_3$ (object/event) preserved in medium $v_4$, by authority $c_1$ over matter/sphere/persons $c_2$ derived on basis $c_3$.
interval event contour: during ...; continuative |-----|.
location tense relation/direction; forwards/to the front of ...
time tense: has been, is now in the aftermath of; (tense/modal).
$d_1=c_1$ is today; $d_1=c_1$ is the day occuring at the same time as $c_2$, day standard $d_3$.
$m_1=c_1$ is the current month by month standard $m_3$, simultaneous with $c_2$ in time.
$x_{1}$ is current at/in the present of/during/concurrent/simultaneous with $x_{2}$ in time.
valsi.notes: (default $x_2$ is the present resulting in:) $x_1$ is now; time relationship only, 'aorist' claiming simultaneity does not mean one event does not extend into the past or future of the other. See also {zvati}, {balvi}, {purci}, cmavo list {ca}, cmavo list {ca'a}.

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is the current year by standard $n_3$, simultaneous with $c_2$ in time.
$x_{1}$ is apparatus/mechanism/device/equipment for function $x_{2}$ controlled/[triggered] by $x_{3}$ (agent).
valsi.notes: Form determined by/from function; does not imply automated/automatic action - requires an external agent/trigger (a minji may be a zmiku cabra if it requires an external agent to trigger or control the functions that it performs automatically). (cf. {tutci}, {minji}, {finti}; {girzu}, {ganzu} for organizational apparatus, pilno)

valsi.definition: $ce_1$ is the modern era.
$c_1=f_1$ is live (experienced as it happens) to experiencer $c_2$.
$k_1=c_1$ ranges through time/has duration $k_2=c_2$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ is the complete duration as the amount of time or an interval specification and is non-aorist. Cf. {temci}.

valsi.definition: time tense: present actuality; modal aspect.
time tense: is now/simultaneously, is now in the middle of; (tense/modal).
$k_1=t_1$ is a tradition/practice/custom of traditional culture $t_2=k_2$ under conditions $t_3$
valsi.notes: This is similar to {ritli}, but the emphasis is not necessarily on particular rituals, but customs (ex. wearing of a particular type of clothing or hairstyle) associated with a group.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ hours in duration (default is 1 hour) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is $x_2$ hours in angular measure of right ascension RA (default is 1).
valsi.notes: Cf. {cacra}, {radno}, {julra'o}, {sostartai}. {pi'e} used in x2 indicates a base of 60.

valsi.definition: $j_1=t_1$ is a convention prescribing $j_2$ (event/state) within community $j_3=t_2$.
$c_1=t_2$ customarily expresses $c_2$ to $c_3$ via medium $c_4$ under conditions $t_3$.
$k_1=c_1$ (agent) idly plays with plaything/toy $k_2$.
$s_1=c_1$ (agent) ceases and rests from activity/process/state $s_2$ (not necessarily completing it).
$x_{1}$ walks/strides/paces on surface $x_{2}$ using limbs $x_{3}$.
$l_1$ is liquid at room temperature/at standard temperature and pressure, and consists of composition/material $l_2$.
$x_{1}$ (event) often/frequently/commonly/customarily occurs/recurs by standard $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: See also {rirci}, {fadni}, {kampu}, {rapli}, {krefu}, {lakne}, cmavo list piso'iroi and similar {compounds}.

valsi.definition: $r_1$ is a frequently-asked question about subject $r_2$
$di_1$ is a barn for storing/sheltering grains/livestock/tools/machinery $da_1$.
$x_1$ is an open/closed wound on locus $x_2$ caused by $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Unlike {velxai}, it's specific to physical injuries pertaining to the surface of an organic body such as skin. Open wounds include {ka'arcagna} for "incision / incised wound", {fercagna} for "laceration", {gukcagna} for "abrasion", {tuncagna} for "puncture wound", {grecagna} for "penetration wound", {batcagna} for "bite wound", {dancagna} for "gunshot wound", {jelcagna} for "burn", {da'ercagna} for "bedsore", {furcagna} for "necrosis"; closed wounds include {daxcagna} for "contusion/bruise", {camdaxcagna} for "hematoma", {ra'ircagna} for "chronic wound". The victim (the whole of the injured body) may be specified by joining it to the x2 with "po" or putting it directly on x2 with "tu'a".

valsi.definition: $g_1$ is a/the agricultural industry/sector producing $g_2=c_4$ from farms $c_1$ located in $c_2$ farmed by $c_3$.
$p_1$ is a farmer associated with farm $c_1$ producing $c_4$.
$z_1$ is a farmer's market selling $z_2$, operated by farmers $z_3=c_3$.
attitudinal: strong intensity attitude modifier.
$b_1=c_1$ is huge/enormous/colossal in property $b_2=c_2$ to observer $b_3=c_3$.
$cat_1$ stares at $cat_2$ as received by observer $car_3$.
$d_1$ craves/intensely wishes $d_2$ (event/state) for purpose $d_3$.
$n_1$ desperately needs/is desperate for $n_2$ for purpose/action/stage of process $n_3$.
$s_1=c_1$ is roaring/blinding to $s_2$ via sensory channel $s_2=c_3$.
time tense: during and after; (tense/modal).
$g_1$ is a/the wholesale/retail industry sector in which $c_1$ trades/barters $c_2 $ for $c_3$ by process $g_3$.
$x_1$ is a beetle of species $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Not to be confused with {ckacinki}; Cf. {kokcinela}, {kurkuli}, {gusycinki}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a mollusk/clam/mussel/snail of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is malacology based on methodology $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is made of/contains/is a quantity of chocolate/cocoa.
$p_1=j_3=c_3$ is mother of pearl from source $p_2=c_2$.
$k_1=c_2$ is a tank/armored combat vehicle for carrying $k_2$, propelled by $k_3$, with armor-plating $c_1$.
$x_1$ is a turtle of species $x_2$.
$c_1=t_1$ is space-time occupied by $c_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a shell/husk [hard, protective covering] around $x_{2}$ composed of $x_{3}$.
$cm_1$ is a geometry describing $cm_2=ca_1=t_1$ geometric object.
$cp_1=ca_1$ demands $cp_2$ from $cp_3$.
$g_1=c_1$ is vast/very wide in (2nd most significant) dimension $g_2=c_2$ with observer $g_3=c_3$.
$g_1$ is intensely happy about $g_2$.
Robin.
$ci_1$ is a fan of/intensely interested in $ci_2$ as received/measured by observer $ca_3$.
$g_1$ is a fanclub for $g_2=ci_2$.
$t_1$ feels horror/is intensely frightened of $t_2$ (event/tu'a object).
$c_1$ effortfully tries to do $t_2$ by method $t_3$, as perceived by $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ vanishes/disappears from location $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ ceases to be observed at $x_{2}$ using senses/sensor $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also leaves, goes away (one sense). See also {cliva}, {ganse}, {zgana}, {lebna}, {vimcu}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is silicon.
$x_{1}$ is idle/at rest/inactive.
valsi.notes: "in motion", not implying a change in location, is negation of this. See also {surla}.

valsi.definition: Hong Kong.
$x_{1}$ is a farm/ranch at $x_{2}$, farmed by $x_{3}$, raising/producing $x_{4}$; (adjective:) $x_{1}$ is agrarian.
valsi.notes: Also grange; farming is any organized agrarian activity, not limited to plant crops. See also {purdi}, {nurma}, {ferti}, {foldi}, {xarju}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ exchanges/trades/barters commodity $x_{2}$ for $x_{3}$ with $x_{4}$; $x_{1}$, $x_{4}$ is a trader/merchant/businessman.
valsi.notes: Also (adjective:) $x_1$, $x_2$, $x_4$ is/are commercial (better expressed as ka canja, {kamcanja}). $x_2$/$x_3$ may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event (possibly service), or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posycanja} for unambiguous semantics); (cf. {dunda}, {friti}, {vecnu}, {zarci}, {jdini}, {pleji}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {banxa}, {cirko}, {dunda}, {janta}, {kargu}, {prali}, {sfasa}, {zivle})

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a window/portal/opening [portal] in wall/building/structure $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is space/volume/region/room [at-least-3-dimensional area] occupied by $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a shovel/spade [bladed digging implement] for digging $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/contains/is made of sand/grit from source $x_{2}$ of composition including $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the gut(s)/entrails/intestines/viscera/innards/digestive system [body-part] of $x_{2}$.
$g_1$ disembowels $c_2=b_2$.
Shanghai.
$l_1$ is an adventurer traveling via route $l_2$ using means/vehicle $x_3$.
$x_1$ threatens $x_2$ with $x_3$ (danger, peril).
$b_1$ snarls/growls/roars the threat of idea/action $s_2$ at audience $s_3$.
$s_1$ (agent) threatens/menaces idea/action $s_2$ to audience $s_3$.
time tense: is going to, is now just about to, is now anticipating; (tense/modal).
$b_1=c_1$ is a tornado/waterspout moving from direction $b_2$ at speed $b_3$ rotating around centre /eye $c_2$ with rotational direction $c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a cart/carriage/wagon [wheeled vehicle] for carrying $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$.
$l_1$ reels in $l_2=c_1$ by handle/at locus $l_3$ by rotating it around axis $c_2$.
$cu_1$ is a roller skate/ice skate for feet $cu_2$, of material $cu_3$, for carrying $x_4=ca_2$.
$x_1$ turns $x_2$ around axis $x_3$ in direction $x_4$.
$x_1$ is a whirligig beetle of species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is intense/bright/saturated/brilliant in property (ka) $x_{2}$ as received/measured by observer $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also lustrous, gleaming, sparkling, shining (all probably better metaphorically combined with gusni: gusycai or camgu'i); in colors, refers principally to increased saturation (with opposite kandi). See also {denmi}, {gusni}, {kandi}, {ruble}, {skari}, {tilju}, {tsali}, {mutce}, {blabi}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ turns/rotates/revolves around axis $x_{2}$ in direction $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a helicopter for carrying $x_2$, propelled by $x_3$.
Rot-13.
$x_{1}$ is a chart/diagram/map of/about $x_{2}$ showing formation/data-points $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ rains/showers/[precipitates] to $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is precipitation [not limited to 'rain'].
$x_{1}$(s) (mass normally, but 1 individual/jo'u possible) discuss(es)/talk(s) about topic/subject $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ [agent] shoves/pushes $x_{2}$ at locus $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Move by pushing/shoving (= {ca'ermuvgau}). (cf. danre for non-agentive force, lacpu)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ looks at/examines/views/inspects/regards/watches/gazes at $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Also look through (= {grecta}, {ravycta}, {bacycta}); note that English "look" often means a more generic "observe". See also {jvinu}, {minra}, {simlu}, {viska}, {lanli}, {zgana}, {setca}, {viska}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ has authority/is an official in/on/over matter/sphere/persons $x_{2}$ derived on basis $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ (agent) kills/slaughters/murders $x_{2}$ by action/method $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a hitman.
claxu modal, 1st place lacked by ...
$cl_1=ci_1$ misses $cl_2=ci_3$.
$g_1$ (person/agent) deprives $c_1$ of $c_2$.
$l_1$ (agent) showers $l_2$.
$f_1=c_1$, consisting of $f_2$, pours into $f_3=c_2$ from $f_4=c_3$.
$k_1$ is a raincoat of material $k_2$, protecting from rain $c_1$.
$l_1=s_1$ (agent) showers itself of soil/contaminant $l_3$ with cleaning material(s) $l_4$.
$x_1$ is a game of chess between $x_2$ (white) and $x_3$ (black).
$x_{1}$ is shallow in extent in direction/property $x_{2}$ away from reference point $x_{3}$ by standard $x_{4}$.
$f_1$ is actual (existing in act or reality, not just potentially).
$f_1$ is rotten/decayed/fermented with decay/fermentation agent $f_2$.
non-logical connective: set link, unordered; "and also", but forming a set.
2-word letteral/shift: the word following indicates a new font (e.g. italics, manuscript).
links terms into an afterthought termset.
digit/number: % percentage symbol, hundredths.
non-logical connective: ordered sequence link; "and then", forming a sequence.
pseudo-quantifier binding a variable within an abstraction that represents an open place.
$x_{1}$ launches/fires/shoots projectile/missile $x_{2}$, propelled by $x_{3}$ [propellant/propulsion].
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is a gun/launcher/cannon; $x_1$ hurls/throws/casts (more general than renro in that propulsion need not be internal to $x_1$). See also {renro}, {danti}, {jakne}, {jbama}, {spoja}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a community/colony of organisms $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is an era/epoch/age characterized by $x_{2}$ (event/property/interval/idea).
valsi.notes: ($x_2$ interval should be the defining boundaries; if merely a characterizing period, the nature of the interval should be expressed in an abstract bridi, or the interval should be marked with tu'a; $x_2$ may also be characteristic object(s) or practices of the era, if marked with tu'a); See also {ranji}, {temci}, {citsi}.

valsi.definition: $m_1=c_1$ is contemporary with/in the same epoch/era as $m_2$ by standard $m_3$ ($m_1=c_1$ and $m_2$ interchangeable).
selbri variable assignment; assigns broda series pro-bridi to a selbri.
$k_1$ believes (without evidence/proof) that the god/deity $c_1$ exists.
$x_{1}$ is a/the habitation/dwelling/house of god $x_{2}$.
$c_1$ is an agnostic.
$z_1$ is the Heaven of religious community $c_2$.
$x_1$ is a polo shirt of material $x_2$.
valsi.notes: A T-shaped shirt with a collar, typically a two- or three-button placket, and an optional pocket. Cf. {creka}.

valsi.definition: $g_1$ (person/mass) attacks with a projectile weapon/shoots victim $g_2$ with goal/objective $g_3$ using launcher/gun $c_1$ which launches/fires/shoots projectile/missle $c_2$ propelled by propellant/propulsion $c_3$.
$x_1$ is December of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$xa_1=c_1$ is a gun/cannon/firearm for use against $xa_2$ by $xa_3$, launching projectile $c_2$ propelled by $c_3$.
valsi.notes: jvajvo; Gismu deep structure is "cecla gi'e xarci".

valsi.definition: $l_1=c_1$ is a tribe with members including $l_1$ according standard $l_3$.
$s1$ pertains to community $s2=c2$
valsi.notes: Cultural gismu replacement lujvo for communities: From gismu {cecmu} and {srana}

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ varies/changes in property/quantity $x_{2}$ (ka/ni) in amount/degree $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Non-resultative, not-necessarily causal change. (cf. cenba which is non-resultative, galfi which is resultative and causal, stika which is non-resultative and causal; stodi, zasni, binxo)

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is $x_2$ percent of $x_3$ in dimension/aspect $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is holy/sacred to person/people/culture/religion/cult/group $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a hundredth [1/100; $1*10^{-2}$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$m_1=c_1$ is $m_2=c_2$ centimeter(s) / hundredth(s) of a meter [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction $m_3=c_3$ by standard $x_4=m_3$.
$x_{1}$ is an heir to/is to inherit $x_{2}$ (object/quality) from $x_{3}$ according to rule $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Pedantically, inheriting an object should be a sumti-raising (tu'a if non-abstract in $x_2$) of inheriting loka ponse the object - the ownership of the object (= {posycerda}, posyselcerda for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {jgina}.

valsi.definition: $m_1=c_1$ is the dawn of day $m_2=c_2$ at location $m_3=c_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a morning [dawn until after typical start-of-work for locale] of day $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: This morning (= {cabdeicerni}); tomorrow morning (= {bavlamcerni}); yesterday morning (= {prulamcerni}, {prulamdeicerni}) See also {vanci}, {murse}, {tcika}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ (mass) is a breakfast composed of dishes including $s_2$.
$x_{1}$ is an expert/pro/has prowess in/is skilled at $x_{2}$ (event/activity) by standard $x_{3}$.
$r_1$ blesses/sanctifies $c_1$ in the name of person/people/culture/religion/cult/group $c_2$ under conditions $r_3$.
$s_1$ worships $s_2=c_1$, which is holy/sacred to $c_2=r_3$, with ritual $r_1$ having form/rules $r_4$.
$cu_1=ce_1$ is a holy book containing work $cu_2$ by (presumed) author $cu_3$ for audience $cu_4=ce_2$ preserved in medium $cu_5$.
$s_1=c_1$ is a holy site to person/people/culture/religion/cult/group $c_2$.
God.
$x_{1}$ is a/the god/deity of people(s)/religion $x_{2}$ with dominion over $x_{3}$ [sphere]; $x_{1}$ is divine.
valsi.notes: Also divinity; $x_2$ religion refers to the religious community as a mass. See also {censa}, {krici}, {lijda}, {malsi}.

valsi.definition: $b_1$ is entirely in the future of $b_2$; $b_1$ begins after $b_2$.
$g_1$ notices $g_2$ by means $g_3$ under condition $g_4=c_1$.
$g_1$ (person/agent) initiates/begins/starts/causes the beginning of $c_1$ (state/event/process).
$p_1$ is preliminary to $c_1=p_2$'s beginning.
$x_{1}$ [state/event/process] commences/initiates/starts/begins to occur; (intransitive verb).
$s_1$ realizes $s_2$ under condition $c_1$.
$x_1$ sits down on $x_2$.
valsi.notes: Simple {zutse} refers to the act of sitting, whereas cfatse means the act of becoming seated. Cf. {co'a}, {zutse}, {tsebi'o}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a work of fiction about plot/theme/subject $x_{2}$/under convention $x_{2}$ by author $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also story, lie, untrue. See also {cukta}, {lisri}, {prosa}, {fatci}, {jitfa}, {jetnu}, {xanri}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ (property - ka) is a flaw/fault/defect in $x_{2}$ causing $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a wedge [shape/form/tool] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (event/state) confuses/baffles $x_{2}$ [observer] due to [confusing] property $x_{3}$ (ka).
digit/number: 3 (digit) [three].
$j_1$ is a writing desk of material $j_2$, supported by legs/base/pedestal $j_3$, used by writer $c_1$.
$f_1=c_1$ writes/authors $f_2=c_2$ for purpose $f_3$ from existing elements/ideas $f_4$.
$s_1=c_2$ is a secretary to $s_2$.
$cu_1=ci_1$ expresses in writing $cu_2=ci_2$ for audience $cu_3$ using display/storage medium $ci_3$ with writing implement $ci_4$.
ciste modal, 1st place used in scalar negation in system/context ...
$k_1$ plays game $k_2=c_1$ governed by rules $c_2$ interrelating game parts (physical or conceptual) $c_3$.
digit/number: infinity; followed by digits => aleph cardinality.
tense interval modifier: occurs infinite times, eternally; objective tense; defaults as time.
$c_1=z_1$ is more interesting than $z_2$ to $c_2$ in amount $z_4$.
cinmo modal, 1st place emotionally felt by ...
ckilu modal, 1st place on the scale ...
$x_1$ is a Wednesday of week $x_2$ on calendar $x_3$.
$c_1$ is trigonometry of triangle $j_1$.
$t_1$ is a triangle.
$d_1$ is a triangle (musical instrument).
$g_1$ is $g_2$ yard/yards (length unit).
$x_1$ is myrrh from tree species $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is blood/vital fluid of organism $x_{2}$.
March.
$x_1$ is March/the third month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
$m_1=d_1$ is the middle finger of $d_2$.
$x_1$ is a 3-dimensional vector with coordinates $x_2$, $x_3$ and $x_4$.
$x_1=kr_3$ is a three-way intersection of roads $x_2=kr_1=kl_1$.
$p_1$ is the third closest planet revolving around $p_2$, with planetary characteristics $p_3$, orbital parameters $p_4$.
$x_1=xi_2$ is a three-wheeled device/vehicle, with wheel made of materials/having properties $xi_3$.

$x_{1}$ is cyan/turquoise/greenish-blue [color adjective].
$c_1=p_1$ is a savage/wild person.
$c_1=r_1$ is a savage/wild human.
$cr_1$ wildcrafts $cr_2$ from $cr_3$=$ci_1$.
